description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**English I (for Non-English Majors)**
--------------------------------------

Fall, 2021

1.  **教學目標****Objectives:**

  This course aims to help students to develop and improve their English abilities; meanwhile, it also helps to build up students’ confidence and interests in English. Student’s participation, discussion, and group activities in class will be the main focus of this course. Different activities will be offered to guide the students to apply basic English vocabularies, sentences, and grammar to build the familiarity toward English, including using different kinds of visual aids, games, and news...etc. Students will engage in different discussion and practice under the instructor’s guide to improve students’ English speaking, listening, writing, and reading abilities. In addition to understanding the grammar and vocabulary, students are required to have further critical thinking toward the issues, subjects, and contents given in class.

**\*Delivery of instruction:**

1.  Lecture
2.  Group discussion & cooperation (Quality Talk)
3.  Student presentation

**\*上課要求與規則****Requirements and Rules:**

1.  If you want to succeed in this class, you need to be willing to devote time participating all the class activities, including class discussion, practice, assignment, and presentation. **Your learning attitude is essential in this class**. You need to focus both on your attendance and class activities. Without joining any class activities, you won’t get a higher score for this class. **(****請注意學習態度，沒有參與課堂活動、討論或練習，也不會獲得高分。**
2.  **Attendance is required**. **Missing 4 classes, without telling your teacher in advance (at least “a week” before your absence) with a proper reason, you will be failed for this class. If you’re late, it costs you 1 point every time. Please note that if you’re late for more than 15 minutes, you’ll be absent for that class. For 1 absence, it costs you 2 points every time. (****缺席四次，在沒有以****「****正當理由及原因****」****事先告知老師下****，將無法通過此課程。每次遲到扣一分，遲到超過****15****分鐘視同缺席****。缺席一次扣****2****分。有任何狀況請記得事先****e-mail****或親自告知老師，請假請****以「正當理由及原因」告知老師並補上證明。****)**

\*Proper reasons contain:

*   Illness or medical emergency (with proof)
*   Family emergencies
*   Pre-arranged school activities (with proof)

1.  **Textbook is a must**. **Violation of this rule will cost you 1 point (out of your final score) each time**. (You can bring no textbook ONLY when teacher informs you!) **(****沒帶課本，每次扣總成績一分，只有在老師提前告知下可不帶課本****)**
2.  **Self-introduction****自我介紹**: We don’t have midterm exam; instead, **you need to write your self-introduction and make a brief presentation in 1~2mins with simple slide (1~3 slides). You cannot bring any notes or phone on the stage**.
3.  **Final presentation** **期末團體報告**: **Followed by teacher’s instruction, each group needs to report and introduce the assigned article by teacher**. **You’ll be scored on voc list, ppt, oral performance, man ideas, important/interesting messages, and individual explanation. (guide the whole class to read/understand the article)** Further information will be given before your presentation.
4.  You **cannot** use your laptop or smart phone in class **without the teacher’s permission**. Violation of this rule will cost you **2** points each time. **(****只有在老師允許時能用電子產品，上課請勿使用手機或筆電，違者每次扣兩分****)**
5.  Lexile Pre-test (藍思閱讀測驗): everyone needs to take Lexile pre-test and read the Scholastic Literacy Pro(藍思線上閱讀系統) for 5 hours. (all in 10%)
6.  **Please check Moodle and e-mail frequently!** It’s your responsibility to make sure you register with the correct email address on Moodle. **Not receiving a notice or forgetting to check is NOT an excuse for any class activities. (****請隨時查****看****Moodle****及老師寄的****e-mail****!** **各種作業、活動因沒有收到通知、不知道或忘了查看而沒做並不是理由。****)**
7.  **Our syllabus will be adjusted based on the real class schedule. Please make sure you read any notice from teacher’s mail or Moodle. (****實際上課進度將因上課狀況做調整****)**
8.  This course aims to offer a positive and comfortable learning environment for all the students to learn in a positive, relaxed, happy mood, so **please RESPECT your classmates, your teacher, and this class. Any serious violation of this class might cause great outcome on your final score. If you have any problems/questions, you are always welcome to talk to your teacher.**
